title: BlackHat/DEFCON 2011 talk: Breaking out of KVM
description:
I’ve posted the final slides from my talk this year at DEFCON and Black Hat, on breaking out of the KVM Kernel Virtual Machine on Linux.
  Virtunoid: Breaking out of KVM  from Nelson Elhage  [Edited 2011-08-11] The code is now available. It should be fairly well-commented, and include links to everything you’ll need to get the exploit up and running in a local test environment, if you’re so inclined.
